post:
Hey!  
  
My name is Hassan and I am here from Hostodo.com. We are now offering KVM virtual servers in Los Angeles, CA, Miami, FL, and Dallas, TX. Today, I will be presenting offers for VPSs on our Asia Optimized network in LA. These VPSs are automatically provisioned with Asia Optimized IPv4s.       
    
**Los Angeles, CA:**   
Asia Optimized IPv4: la.asia.hostodo.com   
Test IPv4: LA.hostodo.com  
Test IPv6: LA6.hostodo.com  
http://LA.hostodo.com/10mb.test  
http://LA.hostodo.com/100mb.test  
   
Here are our offers:  
  
**KVM-1024**  
1024MB RAM  
25GB Disk Space  
1.5TB Bandwidth  
1 IPv4  
Open a ticket for as many IPv6 as you need  
1 Gbit Port   
KVM/SolusVM  
   
**PROMOCODE: LEASIA1024**     
[**$6.99 PER MONTH**](https://hostodo.com/portal/cart.php?a=add&pid=130&promocode=LEASIA1024)   
  
**KVM-512**  
512MB RAM  
15GB Disk Space  
1TB Bandwidth   
1 Asia Optimized IPv4   
Open a ticket for as many IPv6 as you need   
1 Gbit Port   
KVM/SolusVM  
   
**PROMOCODE:  LEASIA512**  
[**$37.99 PER YEAR**](https://hostodo.com/portal/cart.php?a=add&pid=132&promocode=LEASIA512&billingcycle=annually)
